author: B. L. van der Waerden
summary: Van der Waerden invites von Neumann to give a lecture at a joint colloquium of the University and E.T.H. Zurich, preferably in late October after the Amsterdam Congress. The invitation includes 300 Swiss francs for travel expenses, with details to be settled in summer 1954.
title: Colloquium Invitation for October 1954
